episodes.title: Sister Wives 5.4 - Polygamist Cults (W. Notes to Self 444)
episodes.description: We're back to season 5, folks, and i'm tagging in some help. I'll be honest, I was planning on taking a break from collaborations for a bit, but then this episode was a struggle for me right away. The Brown teenagers (or a few of them) go to meet with and help Holding out Help, the organization that helps former polygamists and cult members escape and establish their new lives. Well, we all know a lot more about these things than we did when this first aired. So Melanie and Cory of Notes to Self 444 (themselves former members of the Browns' sect the AUB) were kind enough to come on and help me understand what's all going on beneath the surface here. To me it's the most enlightening podcast i've ever done, thanks to them, so I hope you enjoy. Notes to Self on Youtube. Notes to Self on TikTok. Notes to Self on Instagram. Listen to my sister podcast I'm Already Scared! Check out The Sister Wives Professor Campus Book Store (merch shop) right here! Follow TSWP on Facebook ⁠⁠⁠⁠right here and join the Facebook group! episodes.title: Polygamy, Sister Wives, and Stigma with Notes to Self 444
episodes.description: Welcome to Plathville will be back next week, but I had the chance to talk to Melanie and Cory of Notes to Self 444 about any number of things, including their first-hand experiences with the AUB - the same cult that brought us the Brown family. We talk all about that and a lot more, so I hope you enjoy. Notes to Self on Youtube. Notes to Self on TikTok. Notes to Self on Instagram.
